appartoo.description:
Participation in the development of a linking application to search for a colocation.
Working on the API (back-end, Symfony3), and UX/UI (front-end, AngularJS).
Active participation in decisions of the company, technical or not.

chat.title: Instant messaging using WebSockets
chat.main_desc: Implementing a WebSockets server for an instant messaging feature to replace the older system using Firebase and avoid duplicating data between Firebase and the application’s relational database.
chat.list: ["Realtime communication with front-end (client) to show new messages in realtime","Configuring a reverse proxy to use SSL","Installation as a supervisor to guarantee disponibility at any time and quality logging","Migrating over 130 000 user conversations from Firebase to mySQL"]
chat.result: Between 5 and 8 seconds of executing time gained over some website’s key features (registering, adding a post)

ux.title: UX modernization and standardization
ux.main_desc: Graphical redesign of how we display posts and profiles on the website, reusing created views all over the application for a better user comfort. Optimizing the search feature.
ux.list: ["Better design overall consistency and comfort during navigation","Modernization of the user interface to stay up to date with actual web conventions ","Auto application of search filters without having to launch it manually every time"]

notif.title: Notifications system’s refactoring
notif.main_desc: Standardization of the notifications system, adding new notifications' types (only email at the time) and code refactoring in a "Notification Center" service.
notif.list: ["Adding desktop notifications (push) using a Service Worker","Supporting Facebook notifications (API Graph)", "Sending SMS (API Nexmo)", "Creating a service to handle sending all these notifications depending on certain criteria"]
notif.result: Possibility for users to be notified using different types of notifications in order to speed up their colocation search while improving code maintenance.
